hero_subtitle_pt1: The power of a full-service marketing agency at a
service_website_desc: Build, upgrade or maintain your website, from simple launches to complex platforms. We handle design, performance, security and updates via a dedicated group chat for quick, transparent changes.
service_seo_desc: Comprehensive SEO audit and a 360° strategy tailored to your market: keyword targeting, technical fixes, content plan and local listings. So customers find you exactly when they’re searching.
service_social_desc: Social media strategies that showcase your work, attract new customers and engage current followers. Content calendars, ads, community management, performance tracking and measurable analytics.
service_other_desc: We analyze your business, audience and goals to identify the channels that matter most. From web design to email marketing, we prioritize high-impact actions and build a focused plan for growth.
faq_q1: What marketing services do you offer?
faq_a1: I offer a comprehensive range of marketing services including social media management, content creation, SEO optimization, website maintenance, PPC campaigns, email marketing, and strategic planning tailored to your business needs.
faq_q2: How much does your marketing service cost?
faq_a2: My standard marketing package starts at $500 per month, which includes end-to-end execution and strategy. Custom packages are available based on your specific requirements and business size.
faq_q3: How long does it take to see results from marketing efforts?
faq_a3: Results vary depending on your industry, competition, and current market position. Typically, you can expect to see initial improvements within 1-2 months, with more significant results appearing after 3-6 months of consistent strategy implementation.
faq_q4: Do you work with businesses in specific industries?
faq_a4: I have experience working with businesses across various industries including Luxury, Fashion, SaaS, Tech, Fitness, Lifestyle, and Real Estate. My approach is adaptable to different market segments and business models.
faq_q5: What is your approach to social media marketing?
faq_a5: My approach to social media marketing involves creating a tailored strategy based on your target audience, developing engaging content, implementing consistent posting schedules, managing community engagement, and utilizing data analytics to continuously optimize performance.
faq_q6: How do you measure marketing success?
faq_a6: I measure success through various KPIs including website traffic, conversion rates, engagement metrics, lead generation, ROI, and ultimately, business growth. Regular reporting and analytics reviews ensure we track progress and adjust strategies as needed.

brand_badge_work: I worked across multiple digital marketing channels, including web design, SEO, content creation, PPC, and email marketing, to strengthen online presence and increase the number of trial sign-ups
brand_badger_review: When Giacomo gets involved in a project, you can instantly envision a fast outcome with the highest quality standards.
brand_gucci_work: Social media marketing and influencer collaborations.
brand_gucci_review: Giacomo's excellent coordination with teams and partners has streamlined processes and delivered major successes, including a Burj Khalifa projection and metro campaigns across Europe.
brand_mikali_work: I developed a branding and marketing strategy for the upcoming luxury brand, including online and offline channels. If you are a luxury business owner, find out how my team and I can help at <1>Luxury Method</1>.
brand_mikali_review: Working with Giacomo is such a joy, experiencing his immense creativity in bring your luxury brand to life in a  way that surpasses all your expectations.
brand_badger_ceo_review: Giacomo Rotella did a fantastic job as a member of the Marketing team at Badger with his in-depth knowledge of content marketing, strategic messaging and branding.
brand_badger_ceo_work: Part of the Gucci Media team in 2023-2024, managing digital marketing initiatives.
brand_social_website_creation: Social media content creation and website development for property marketing.
brand_digital_strategy: Digital marketing strategy and brand positioning in competitive markets.
brand_seo_content: SEO strategy, content writing, and social media content development.
brand_event_promo: Event promotion, social media strategy, and content creation.
brand_dock_bay_work: I developed a global brand strategy for the eco-friendly quick-dry towels company, including a US market entry plan and marketing campaigns to build awareness and engagement with the target audience.
brand_jack_wills_work: I developed a digital marketing strategy for the British premium clothing brand, alongside a US market entry plan. My work focused on establishing a strong market presence to grow the brand's audience.
brand_radiance_work: In addition to a 360° marketing strategy, we created and manage the website, custom CRM, and analytics dashboard of this premium clinic. We also manage the 15K+ followers' social media accounts.
brand_gucci_specific_work: In 2023–2024, I was part of Gucci's EMEA media team, contributing to the brand's omnichannel marketing strategy. If you are a luxury business owner, discover how my team and I can help at <1>Luxury Method</1>.
brand_kanan_work: My team and I supported Kanan through website optimization, Google Ads campaigns, content creation, and social media management, strengthening the brand's digital presence and increasing conversions.
brand_kukreja_work: We designed and developed a modern website and created social media content for this luxury real estate developer, focusing on a visually striking and user-friendly experience across all channels.
brand_websitesetup_work: I drastically enhanced SEO performance through strategic keyword research and strategy, link building, and content writing. Several of the pages I created achieved first-page ranking on Google.
brand_lanes_work: I managed content creation, social media strategy, website design, and analytics for a newly established streetwear fashion brand, driving enhanced online visibility, audience engagement, and conversions.
brand_offbeat_work: We developed an integrated marketing strategy, including branding, web design, SEO content writing, social media, guerrilla marketing, and book marketing, and built a WhatsApp community from the ground up.
brand_ai_summit_work: My team and I worked on the design, development, and optimization of the website and custom CMS for this AI event. Our efforts ensured a cohesive visual identity and a seamless digital experience.
brand_risin_work: I provide continuous marketing support to a leading startup incubation, venture studio, and investment firm in the Middle East and India, as well as to its events, partners, and portfolio startups.

onboarding_footer: The first call is free and designed to provide clarity on whether this is the right fit.

cookie_description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. Your privacy is our priority.
cookie_settings_description: Choose which cookies you allow us to use. You can change these settings at any time.
cookie_necessary_desc: Essential for the website to function correctly.
cookie_functional_desc: Remembering your preferences like language or theme.
cookie_analytics_desc: Helping us understand visitor behavior to optimize performance.
cookie_marketing_desc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements to you.
cookie_privacy_text: For more information about how we process your data, please read our
privacy_sec1_content: Welcome to Rotella Giacomo's website. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy_sec2_content:
Rotella Giacomo
Email: rotellagiacomo@gmail.com
Website: www.rotellagiacomo.com
privacy_sec3_content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you:
privacy_sec3_item2: Contact Data: Email address, telephone number
privacy_sec3_item3: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, time zone, operating system
privacy_sec3_item4: Usage Data: Information about how you use our website
privacy_sec3_item5: Marketing Data: Your preferences in receiving marketing from us
privacy_sec4_content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
privacy_sec4_item1: To provide and improve our services
privacy_sec4_item2: To communicate with you about our services
privacy_sec4_item3: To send you marketing communications (with your consent)
privacy_sec4_item4: To analyze website usage and improve user experience
privacy_sec5_content: Under GDPR, we process your personal data based on:
privacy_sec5_item1: Consent: You have given clear consent for us to process your personal data for a specific purpose
privacy_sec5_item2: Contract: Processing is necessary for a contract we have with you
privacy_sec5_item3: Legal obligation: Processing is necessary for us to comply with the law
privacy_sec5_item4: Legitimate interests: Processing is necessary for our legitimate interests or the legitimate interests of a third party
privacy_sec6_content: We may share your personal data with:
privacy_sec6_item3: Regulatory Authorities: When required by law
privacy_sec6_footer: We require all third parties to respect the security of your personal data and to treat it in accordance with the law.
privacy_sec7_content: Some of our external third parties are based outside the European Economic Area (EEA). Whenever we transfer your personal data out of the EEA, we ensure a similar degree of protection is afforded to it by implementing appropriate safeguards.
privacy_sec8_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed. We limit access to your personal data to those who have a genuine business need to know it.
privacy_sec9_content: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
privacy_sec10_content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:
privacy_sec10_item1: Access: Request access to your personal data
privacy_sec10_item2: Correction: Request correction of your personal data
privacy_sec10_item3: Erasure: Request erasure of your personal data
privacy_sec10_item4: Object: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy_sec10_item5: Restriction: Request restriction of processing your personal data
privacy_sec10_item6: Data Portability: Request transfer of your personal data
privacy_sec10_item7: Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time
privacy_sec10_footer: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at:
privacy_sec11_content: Our website uses cookies to distinguish you from other users. This helps us to provide you with a good experience when you browse our website and also allows us to improve our site. For detailed information on the cookies we use and the purposes for which we use them, see our
privacy_sec12_content: This website may include links to third-party websites, plug-ins and applications. Clicking on those links or enabling those connections may allow third parties to collect or share data about you. We do not control these third-party websites and are not responsible for their privacy statements.
privacy_sec13_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy_sec14_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
privacy_sec15_content: You have the right to make a complaint at any time to the Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante per la protezione dei dati personali) or your local supervisory authority for data protection issues.
privacy_sec15_footer: Garante per la protezione dei dati personali Website:
terms_sec1_content: By accessing our website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.
terms_sec2_content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Rotella Giacomo and its licensors.
terms_sec3_content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Italy, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms_sec4_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
cookie_sec1_content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work, or work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the owners of the site.
cookie_sec2_content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, analyze our traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from. We use different types of cookies to run our website and services.
cookie_sec3_essential_desc: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
cookie_sec3_functional_desc: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as language preferences and region selection. They may be set by us or by third-party providers.
cookie_sec3_analytics_desc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our website and services.
cookie_sec3_marketing_desc: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.
cookie_sec4_content: In addition to our own cookies, we may also use various third-party cookies to report usage statistics of the website and deliver advertisements on and through the website.
cookie_sec4_item1: Google Analytics for website traffic analysis
cookie_sec5_content: Cookies can be either "session" cookies or "persistent" cookies:
cookie_sec5_item1: Session Cookies: These are temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser
cookie_sec5_item2: Persistent Cookies: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them
cookie_sec6_content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie preferences by clicking on the appropriate opt-out links provided in the cookie consent banner.
cookie_sec6_footer: To reset your cookie preferences and see the consent banner again, click the button below:
cookie_sec7_content: Most web browsers allow some control of most cookies through the browser settings. To find out more about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set, visit:
cookie_sec8_content: Some browsers incorporate a "Do Not Track" (DNT) feature that signals to websites you visit that you do not want to have your online activity tracked. We currently do not respond to DNT signals.
cookie_sec9_content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to the cookies we use or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please revisit this Cookie Policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.
cookie_sec10_content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or other technologies, please contact us:
cookie_sec11_content: For more information about how we handle your personal data, please see our
cookie_sec6_change_settings_desc: Click the button below to review and change your cookie preferences:
